INSERT INTO SQLite
func:
var di = msg.payload.onoff; //int
var machine = msg.payload.MachineID; //string
var ts= msg.payload.timestamp;//int
var signal = msg.payload.signal;//string
var datetime = msg.payload.date; // string

msg.topic= "INSERT INTO signal_logging(di,machine,ts,signal,datetime)\
VALUES("+di+",'"+machine+"',"+ts+",'"+signal+"','"+datetime+"')"

return msg;

name: CREATE TABLE
func:
msg.topic= "CREATE TABLE signal_logging(di INT,machine TEXT,ts INT,datetime TEXT,signal Text)";

return msg;

name: "INSERT INTO
func:

msg.topic= "INSERT INTO signal_logging(`Digital_Input`, `Machine`, `Timestamp`, `Datetime`, `Signal`)\
VALUES("+di+",'"+machine+"',"+ts+",'"+datetime+"','"+signal+"')"
